title: BTC price 'absolutely primed' to gain says trader as Bitcoin eyes $45K
description:
Bitcoin market gurus hold differing opinions of what will happen to the nearly $100 million in sell-side liquidity at $45,000.

Bitcoin (BTC) stuck to a rigid trading range into the Dec. 24 weekly close as one trader predicted a fresh BTC price breakout.

Data from Cointelegraph Markets Pro and TradingView followed strictly sideways moves for BTC/USD over the weekend.

These had begun into the end of the Wall Street trading week, the last before the Christmas holiday period, as Bitcoin rejected volatility off the year’s final United States macro data.

Read more

title: Law Offers Fast-Track Citizenship for Bitcoin Donations to El Salvador, Report Says
description: Under El Salvador’s recently approved immigration reform law, foreigners who donate to the government’s social and economic development programs will be eligible for expedited citizenship. However, the reform law does not reveal the amount of bitcoins that foreigners must donate to become eligible for expedited citizenship. title: Controversial Claims Surround MEXC Exchange Practices
description:
The allegations revolve around MEXC’s operation as a broker rather than a legitimate peer-to-peer (P2P) exchange, raising significant red flags in the trading community. According to a recent source, the heart of this problem is the failure of the MEXC Exchange to transparently disclose its role as a broker while offering a range of listed […]
